duplicate_email: There is an account with the same e-mail address.
invalid_pass: Password must be longer than 8 letters, and must contain at least one number and one capital letter.
signup_success: Sign-up successful, Now you can login.
quiz_not_exist: A quiz with these criteria does not exist.
anti_cheat_det: Our anti-cheat systems have detected cheating! Please don't try to refresh or F12.
already_in_quiz: You are already in a quiz. Please finish before starting a new one or click reset to reset it.
quiz_reset_success: Your quiz has been reset. You can now start a new quiz.
